page: CE69013: Planning And Design Of Env. Engg. Facilities

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Design of water supply systems: Selection of site for the source of water supply, design of units for sedimentation, coagulation, flocculation, Granular media filtration, disinfection, water softening, advanced tertiary treatments, design of city water supply pumping and distribution system.
